name: Witchcrafty
description:
What could be more exciting and unpredictable than the world of dreams? Only a magical adventure in the world of dreams! A story for all ages, which will allow you to make a company of a charming little witch, in her exciting, but not logical, adventures!
What do we have?
Little cute witch with unhealthy crave of explosions
Magic kleptomanian cat
All attributes of magic and sorcery - from cooking potions to flying on a broomstick
Incredibly cute gameplay with entertaining puzzles
Giant owls
And the sea of ​​useless gold coins with which you can fill your pockets, but you can not spend it, although you really want[/ list]
